CustomField.description: Flat fee in Project currency by which to increase the billable amount of any Expense logged for the Project. The calculation will apply any percentage expense fee*before* this flat expense fee amount.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flat fee in Project currency by which to increase the billable amount of any Expense logged for the Project. The calculation will apply any percentage expense fee*before* this flat expense fee amount.
CustomField.label: Billable Expense Fee Flat
